line_1: Where erst the boat, and slowly moving barge,
line_2: Now wanton boys and men do roam at large;

line_1: They stop the Chariot, and they board the Barge.
line_2: By land, by water, they renew the charge,

line_1: Than when Edgar was row'd by eight kings in his barge;
line_2: May thy river still swell, better pleas'd with his charge
